RemoteClient - Class in com.javasbar.smart.framework.lib.common
RemoteClient for ssh'ing.
RemoteClient(String, CompositeConfiguration) - Constructor for class com.javasbar.smart.framework.lib.common.RemoteClient
All the authentication, address info related to the m/c for which
ssh has to be done will be provided in configuration with key names
starting with "key_"
For example if key=feed1 then, parameters that would be searched for are;
feed1_userName, feed1_password...
